page.title: 17Dene College.
page.content: Once Dene Park was a big estate owned by John Hollom it included 682 acres of land,out buildings,stables and a farm.Since then the estate has been split up.John Hollom did many things to make the building look old he had an oak fire place built with 1591 on it.Dene Park is no longer a private house it is a residential college for spastic teenagers.There are 50 students of 16-19 all of them are both mentally and physically handicapped. The college has special equipment for these students,such as electric wheelchairs and computers which have easy programmes. All students in the college own animals, such as rabbits,fish and birds,so that they can experience responsibility. Samantha
